text: The List of Yokohama F. Marinos players is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Yokohama F. Marinos is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in Yokohama.Soccerway.com, "Yokohama F.
